instruction: I want to get a new phone. Pick 3 phones to compare and explain why they would be good choices.
output: The three phones to compare would be the Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max, the Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra, and the Google Pixel 5. The iPhone 12 Pro Max is the most powerful and feature-packed Apple phone with the best OLED display and excellent cameras. The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra has a stunning 6.8-inch display and an impressive camera setup with 8K video recording and 100X Zoom. The Google Pixel 5 is a great all-rounder with a vibrant 6-inch OLED screen, top-end duo of cameras, 5G connectivity, and excellent battery life.
